SelectionFunctions-0.1.0.0

Stabilitybeta
Maintainermatej.petkovic@student.fmf.uni-lj.si,tomaz.stepisnik@student.fmf.uni-lj.si
Safe HaskellSafe-Inferred

Tychonoff

Description

In this module we define a selection function on a product of compact spaces with selection functions, which is also compact according to Tychonoff theorem. Code is described in paper What Sequential Games, the Tychonoff Theorem and the Double-Negation Shift have in Common, 2010, by Martin Escardo.
